item.description:
You Don't Have Any Problems
with Father Peter Bowes Co Director of the Order of Christ Sophia & The Centers of Light
Friday, November 20 • 7:30 p.m.
Suggested Donation: $25

If God is Love, if we are loved by God, how can we have any problems? If we accept into our being the reality of God’s goodness, love, and caring for us, then the natural result of that would be to trust our lives to God’s care. People are easily distracted by things that seem hard or inconvenient and tend to label these things as ‘bad’ or as a ‘problem’. What if all things ‘good’ and ‘bad’ are just God trying to tell us something about life? Come and begin a journey into the reality of God’s love and the perfect care God takes of each person.

www.CentersOfLight.org
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the orange line.
item.name: Seminar: You Don't Have Any Problems
